title: "See Bioluminescence"
---

Imagine standing on the beach at night, watching waves crash onto the shore and glowing blue with every ripple. Bioluminescence is one of natureâ€™s most magical phenomena where living organisms emit light. It's like witnessing stars in the ocean.

Why itâ€™s a must-do

Otherworldly experience: Itâ€™s like stepping into a sci-fi movie. Whether seen from a boat or while wading in shallow waters, itâ€™s simply mesmerizing.
Rare and fleeting: Bioluminescence is a natural phenomenon, and being at the right place at the right time makes it a truly unique experience.
Best locations to experience it

Puerto Rico: Mosquito Bay in Vieques is known for some of the brightest bioluminescent waters in the world.
Maldives: Certain beaches glow during the summer months.
San Diego, USA: Red tides cause spectacular blue glowing waves along the coast.
Pro tip
Plan your trip around a new moon for the darkest skies and best visibility of the glowing waters.
